PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-03482000-03-230,  ,  ,  HEALTH,  EC, 
PrecisEnactment of the PERSISTENCE AND BIOACCUMULATION REGULATIONS which prescribe the scientific criteria for determining the properties and characteristics of any distinguishable kind of organic or inorganic matter, including their persistence and bioaccumulation properties, as well as the conditions, test procedures and laboratory practices to be followed for analysing, testing or measuring the property or characteristic, effective March 31, 2000.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0107 Publication Date: 2000-03-29
